page.title: 06Churches
page.content: {Churches.}There are three churches in Lyndhurst and one in Emery Down.The Church of England ,{St. Michael and {All Angels}a church has been on the on the same site since 1200 a.d.A new church was built in 1740.{The present {church was built in 1860.}Designed by William White.F.S.A.{The spire is 160 {feet tall.}There is a painting on the wall behind the altar which is 24 feet long by 8 feet high. It is a picture of the 10 virgins and was painted by Lord Leighton.{The bell tower has 8 {bells .}On the south side is the grave of Alice Hargreaves who was the Alice in Alice in wonderland. {Baptist Chapel Built in 1848,the same year as the school.There have been Baptists in Lyndhurst for over 200 years. The{Roman Catholic Church was built in 1895.{Joanna Hayes 8.
